subject: Greetings From Mrs Helen Giamm
body:
Greetings From Mrs Helen Giamma
With Due Respect and Humanity, I was compelled to write to you under a
humanitarian ground. My names are Mrs Helen Giamma am 58 years old, I
am married to Rick Giamma ; We were married for 27 years without a
child. He died after Before my husband died last year there is this
sum of Â£70 millions pounds that he welded with a Cardiac Arteries
Operation. Bank here and presently the fund is still with the Bank.
Having known my condition I decided to donate this fund to individual
that will utilize I want somebody that will use this fund according to
the desire of my late husband to help less privileged people,
orphanages, widows. I took this decision because I don't have any
child that will inherit this fund, and I don't want in a way were this
fund will be used in wrong way.If you wish to help me actualize this
vision, please indicate your readiness immediately you received this
proposal. I need all your full name information and address right now
Your information and address only OK,
1Your First Name ........
2Your Second Name .........
3Your Country ..........
4Your City ..............
Telephone ......
Your id card
,
Home Address: Age:
Remain blessed you as you listen to the voice of reasoning.
Your beloved sister
Mrs Helen Giamma
Email; 
ayab76994@gmail.com

subject: Re: Greetings From Mrs Helen Giamm
body:
Hello Mrs. Helen Giamma,

I'm deeply moved by your story and the noble cause you're pursuing. It's truly admirable that even in such a difficult time, you're thinking about helping others. I would be more than happy to assist in any way I can.

However, before we proceed, could you please provide me with more details about how this fund will be used? What are some of the specific projects or initiatives that you have in mind? Also, could you tell me more about your late husband's vision for this fund?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Brian
